alert.note: Alert for Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Harlan and southwestern Letcher Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Banks to Pine Mountain to Spruce Pine. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nolansburg, Pine Mountain, Putney and Gilley around 450 PM EDT. Evarts, Totz, Gordon, Bailey Creek, Darkmont and Kildav around 455 PM EDT. Highsplint, Shields, Colts, Diane, Short Town, Kenvir and Hiram around 500 PM EDT. Cumberland, Linefork, Louellen, Black Bottom and Kingdom Come S.P. around 505 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Benham, Clover-Darby, Blair, Closplint, Lejunior, Clutts, Harlan, Lynch, Harlan Gas, Clovertown, Kitts, Golden Ash, Rosspoint, Coxton, Clover and Ages. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
